byline.original: By SCOTT SHANE and ARTIN AFKHAMI
byline.contributor: Scott Shane reported from Washington, and Artin Afkhami from Boston.

snippet: A purported Iranian scheme to kill the Saudi ambassador to the United States, if true, would be only the latest episode in a covert struggle between the two countries.
lead_paragraph: A purported Iranian scheme to kill the Saudi ambassador to the United States, if true, would be only the latest episode in a covert struggle between the two countries.

headline.main: Allegations of Iranian and U.S. Plots Are Added to a History of Hostility
headline.print_headline: Allegations of Iranian and U.S. Plots Are Added to a History of Hostility
headline.seo: U.S. and Iran Playing Out Old Story With Accusations
